roleset.name: dance in a boppy way
roleset.note: BOP-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire (from bop.01-v)

role.descr: partner, body part made to dance, or explicit mention of dance itself

example.name: sort of idiomatic usage
example.text: Cyndi Lauper: A loopy, lovable misfit, she bopped till she dropped.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She bopped her head and mouthed words along to songs on her iPod.
